attributes.action: Give amnesty to those who have spend more than 10 years in uk
attributes.additional_details: Every live matters every one should be given equal rights
attributes.background: Give amnesty to those who have spend more than 10 years in uk because every live matters

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want an amnesty, but it's not clear what for. If you want an amnesty for undocumented migrants you might like to sign the following petition:

Grant an urgent Amnesty to Undocumented Migrants living in the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567681

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
